Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometri.AbstractForm
      • geometri.Oval
        • geometri.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometricalForm, java.lang.Comparable<GeometricalForm>

    public class Circle
extends Oval
    A class that represents a Circle and have the ability to draw it on a JApplet or a JFrame.
    Author:
    Albin Bååw, Kristoffer Ek

              int y,
              int diameter,
              java.awt.Color c)
       throws IllegalPositionException
        A Constructor function, creating a brand new circle.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y Coordinate.
        diameter - The Diameter of the circle.
        c - The Color of the circle.
        Throws:
        IllegalPositionException - if the x- or the y-coordinate is negative.
